title: What do you know about OCR technology and how can it help in identity verification industry? - Technological Ideas - Quora

response.answer_text: The online businesses aiming to ensure a clean customer base are either required to perform identity verification to secure businesses or comply with regulatory requirements. Digital document verification against government-issued identity documents can help online businesses filter out bad actors. OCR technology is used in document verification in which an online user uploads an ID card, passport, driving license or credit/debit card, etc. to verify a person. With OCR, the information is extracted automatically and verified within seconds.
